Chinese Definition:
①“鏌鋣”(mòyé)：古代寶劍名，也作“莫邪”。

yé

鋣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yé］
［《集韻》余遮切，平麻，以。］
亦作“釾1”。“铘1”的繁体字。
见“鏌鋣”。

鋣字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1308第09
【玉篇】同釾。【後漢·崔駰傳】求鏌鋣於明智。【註】吳越春秋曰：干將，吳人也。造二劒，一曰干將，二曰莫邪。莫邪者，干將之妻名也。干將作劒，采五山之精，合六金之英，百神臨觀，遂以成劒。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鋣; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1308 No. 09
[Jade articles] The same 釾. [Later Han·Cui Qi Biography] Seeking to be wise. [Note] Wu Yue Chunqiu said: Gan Jiang, Wu Ren Ye. To make two 劒, one is a general, and the other is Moxie. Moxie, the name of Gan Jiang's wife. The generals are the masters, picking the essence of the five mountains, combining the six golds, and the hundred gods to watch, and then they are successful.
